title: Is there a way to track progress to the next honor level? and if there isn't will there be one?
body: I feel like there should be a feature for this if there isn't {{champion:32}}

replies.body: We don't have a way for you to track that Honor exp at the moment, mainly because we didn't want people to feel like they needed to grind out games to rank up.
So it's better to have no idea about progression and leveling up feel random?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zpwdt8nx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-14T03:22:03.343+0000)
>
> We don't have a way for you to track that Honor exp at the moment, mainly because we didn't want people to feel like they needed to grind out games to rank up.

ok thanks for telling me its just discouraging knowing that im being positive in my games and some of my salty friends around me are lvling up faster me but just curious thanks

The honor levels seem to come randomly, like it doesn't happen right after you hit a certain number of honors. I received honor lvl 4 today after I just logged on. The capsules/key frags also seem to come in this same fashion. 

So I don't think there will be an indication bar, because it'll force people to continuously play nice and get them as "surprise" rewards. 

BUT I would like to add the option of actually being able to see other peoples honor. They already have the honor level space made on each profile.

I don't see why honor should be hidden at all... unless people in ranked actually look up everyone's profile in their match on a regular basis.
I got honor level 4 without even seeing the popup saying I got it, whereas honor level 3 had the popup. Just keep playing regularly and you'll get it.
